Name: Aviator #1
Ingredients: 15 ml Egg white (pasteurised) or 																																			Aquafaba (chickpea water)																								 or 3 dashes Fee Brothers Fee Foam cocktail foamer
7.5 ml Joseph Cartron Double Crème de Cassis de Bourgogne
Instructions: SHAKE first 4 ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass. POUR cassis into centre of drink (it should sink).
Review: An Aviation with egg white and a dash of cassis in the bottom but is actually better and more balanced when the cassis is shaken with the other ingredients.
Nutrition: One serving of Aviator #1 contains 198 calories
